name: DN1210-023-01 ITP Traffic signs Installation
template name: DN1210-023-01 ITP Traffic signs Installation Rev 0

name: SECTION 3 – PRE-CONSTRUCTION - MATERIAL, PERSONEL & THIRD PARTY APPROVALS
Detail - Pothole all services prior to commencement of trenching. Suitably protect the existing services from construction damage.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - All underground services marked on site before pot holing or excavation
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Pre Excavation
Detail - Ensure sign products and systems are listed in NZ transport agency's accepted products and systems table in Appendix F of P24
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Listed in Apendix F of P24: specification for permanent traffic signs
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Prior to installation
Detail - All signs be reflectorised with Class 1W sheeting, and must be turned about 5 degree away from the driver's line of sight.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Visual Inspection: Manufactrur's confirmance
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Prior to Construction and after installation
Detail - Ensure materials are delivered as per project schedule and specifications
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Materials delivered in good condition, without damage to anything
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - 100% of material deliveries
Verification Activity: By - SE, QE, SUP
SECTION 4 – CONSTRUCTION ACTIVITY - W-Section GuardRail Installation/Sign Installation

Detail - Set out to be done as per IFC drawings/design Specification, if there is no model and position for sign post to mount on grond: seek Engineer's consent follow the installation schedule as per WSP-DR-RSA 0326
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Visual Inspection: checks for appropriate position for sign to install
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Each installation
Detail - Sign installation follow standard method as indicated in specification and drawings
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Visual Inspection: checks for appropriate position for sign to install
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Each installation
4.3 - Installation of large signs with face area more than 4.7m2 Specific design
Detail - The foundation for post need to be 3500 deep with 750mm dia
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Foundation as per design and drawing
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Each installation
4.4 - Installation of large signs with face area more than 4.7m2 Specific design
Detail - The foundation for post need to be 3500 deep with 750mm dia, 75mm cover all over: 12YD16 longitubinal bars with YR12@200mm spiral.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Foundation REO as per dwg 0336:
Verifying Document - Pre Pour inspection/photo/ Concrete Docket
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Each installation
4.5 - Installation of large signs withface area more than 4.7m2 Specific design
Detail - The Foundation post pour inspection
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Each installation

Detail - All signs be reflectorised with Class 1W sheeting, and must be turned about 5 degree away from the driver's line of sight. The chevron boards beed to be turned about 10 degrees away as per section 1.10 from MOTSAM part 1
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Prior to Construction and after installation
4.7 - Foundation Embedment depths for signage posts
Detail - The depths provided in the schedule do not include the topsoil, total depth below surface of the signs shall be the embedment depths plus the topsoil depth
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Visual Inspection: checks for specified embedment depth
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Each installation
SECTION 5 – POST CONSTRUCTION (FINAL INSPECTION AND HANDOVER)
5.1 - Final Inspection and approval of installed signs
Detail - Conduct final inspection and audit of all installations
Verifying Document - Final inspection reports, Compliance Sticker from the installer
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - 100% of installations
5.2 - As built and records of installed signage
Detail - As built and record of installed barriers
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - 100% of installations
Client Final Inspection - the signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Specifications and verifies lot compliance.

Detail - Set out new and existing services and identify clashes with design
